short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to register web pages as documents in ContactsLaw.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows the user to register web pages and downloads as documents in ContactsLaw. This can be done in several ways; by clicking the 'Register web page' button, by printing to the 'Register PDF in ContactsLaw' printer or by right-clicking a link and selecting the 'Save link to ContactsLaw' command.

ContactsLaw is a legal practice management system designed by Western Australian lawyers for small to medium-sized law firms.

To use this extension, you must have ContactsLaw installed on the same computer. Document registration is started using the custom URI scheme that is installed along with the ContactsLaw desktop application.
